005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.Locale;
012
013import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018/**
019 * A trait indicating that the implementation is a localized definition that is
020 * declared in-line as an instance.
021 *
022 * @param <DEFINITION>
023 *          the associated definition Java type
024 * @param <INSTANCE>
025 *          the associated instance Java type
026 */
027public interface IFeatureDefinitionInstanceInlined<
028    DEFINITION extends IDefinition,
029    INSTANCE extends INamedInstance>
030    extends IDefinition, INamedInstance {
031
032  @Override
033  default QName getDefinitionQName() {
034    return getReferencedDefinitionQName();
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  default DEFINITION getDefinition() {
039    return ObjectUtils.asType(this);
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  default boolean isInline() {
044    // has to be inline
045    return true;
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  @NonNull
050  default INSTANCE getInlineInstance() {
051    return ObjectUtils.asType(this);
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  default String getEffectiveFormalName() {
056    return getFormalName();
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  default MarkupLine getEffectiveDescription() {
061    return getDescription();
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  default String getEffectiveName() {
066    // don't use use-name
067    return getName();
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  default Integer getEffectiveIndex() {
072    return getIndex();
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  @Nullable
077  default Object getEffectiveDefaultValue() {
078    // This is an inline instance that is both a definition and an instance. Don't
079    // delegate to the definition, since this would be redundant.
080    return getDefaultValue();
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Generates a "coordinate" string for the provided inline definition instance.
085   *
086   * A coordinate consists of the element's:
087   * <ul>
088   * <li>containing Metaschema module's short name</li>
089   * <li>model type</li>
090   * <li>definition name</li>
091   * <li>hash code</li>
092   * </ul>
093   *
094   * @return the coordinate
095   */
096  @SuppressWarnings("null")
097  @Override
098  default String toCoordinates() {
099    IModule module = getContainingModule();
100    return String.format("%s-inline-definition:%s:%s/%s@%d",
101        getModelType().toString().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
102        module.getShortName(),
103        getContainingDefinition().getName(),
104        getName(),
105        hashCode());
106  }
107}
